attributes.action: Urine samples & random drug alcohol testing of all MP's in particular ministers.
attributes.additional_details: The cross chamber allegations of drug use are referenced in Hansard, the National papers also refer to the traces of cocaine and the need to refurbish those toilets to remove the offending traces. The fights/aggressive/inappropriate behavior are all a matter of public record. Decisions of a life and death nature are being made and the public need to be reassured that these MP's take their responsibilities in a sober manner.
attributes.background: The subsidised bars, fights, aggressive and inappropriate behavior and toilets used by MP's where traces of cocaine have been found demand action.
